headline: Will Segmental Sales Bolster L3Harris Technologies Stock in Q4 Earnings?
summary: LHX stock has a four-quarter average earnings surprise of 2.78%. Solid sales and operating margin must have boosted its Q4 earnings.

headline: US Army Awards L3Harris Nearly $300 Million for Resilient Communications Program
summary: ROCHESTER, N.Y., January 27, 2025--The U.S. Army has awarded L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) full-rate Manpack and Leader radio production orders under the Handheld, Manpack & Small Form Fit (HMS) program totaling nearly $300 million.
